      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_c2445acfb1439797761d8deb1bb7d0cac06054f8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring the strength of the flux density of the Earth's magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Stärke der Flußdichte der magnetischen Masse
messend, fangen Sie auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de la force de la densité de flux du champ
magnétique de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medindo a força da densidade do fluxo do campo 
magnético da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misurazione della resistenza della densità di 
cambiamento continuo del campo magnetico della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της δύναμης της πυκνότητας ροής του γήινου 
μαγνητικού πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medir la fuerza de la densidad del flux del campo 
magnético de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for measuring the flux density of the Earth's magnetic field using a Hall probe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hall probe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flux density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß eine Installation
für das Messen der Flußdichte der magnetischen Masse mit einer Hall 
Prüfspitze auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour 
mesurer la densité de flux du champ magnétique de la terre en 
utilisant une sonde de Hall.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
medir a densidade do fluxo do campo magnético da terra usando uma 
ponta de prova de Salão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per 
la misurazione della densità di cambiamento continuo del campo 
magnetico della terra usando una sonda del Corridoio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για τη 
μέτρηση της πυκνότητας ροής του γήινου μαγνητικού πεδίου 
χρησιμοποιώντας έναν έλεγχο αιθουσών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
medir la densidad del flux del campo magnético de la tierra usando 
una punta de prueba de Pasillo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halle Prüfspitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flußdichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sonde de hall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mesure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">densité de flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ponta de prova do salão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">densidade do fluxo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sonda del corridoio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">misura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">densità di cambiamento continuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έλεγχος αιθουσών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέτρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυκνότητα ροής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punta de prueba del pasillo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">densidad del flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
